Judul: COMPUTER TROUBLESHOOTING EXPERT SYSTEM OF IT HELP DESK FOR EMPLOYEE SELF SERVICE
Abstrak:
Technology can be very difficult to understand, IT Department is a single most helpful tool for anything 

technology related. The IT Department, in this case is IT Help Desk, can help the user with anything from 

hardware or software issue resolution. It could also supply the user with training that necessary to operate or 

maintain the userÃ‚Â’s hardware or software. The IT Help Desk can also help the users obtain new hardware or 

software packages, if needed. The problem arises if the IT Help Desk staffs are limited while the userÃ‚Â’s problem 

rises in a big number. This paper is aimed to help the users in order to solve their Computer problem. Therefore 

it needs one media as the bridge between IT Help Desk and user to help the user can solve the trivial computer 

problem. This software could guide the user to identify what the problem is and give a solution by using rulebased 

reasoning in term of forward-chaining of inference engine. Furthermore, it could also be an efficient way 

to reduce the IT Help Desk job.
Kata Kunci: troubleshooting, exspert system, IT help desk, empoyee self service.
